Decadel/Hakibuscon

	Decadel looked around the base.  Everyone was gone.  He walked around some
more, and then he saw Dark Mouse limping.

	"Um, excuse me, you look like you need some help.  My name's Decadel, I'm
new to the group," He said to her, looking at her wounds.
